alert.note: Alert for Freestone; Limestone (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 21 at 8:27PM CDT until March 21 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Freestone County in central Texas... Northeastern Limestone County in central Texas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 827 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 10 miles east of Groesbeck, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Teague around 840 PM CDT. Fairfield around 850 PM CDT. Fairfield Lake State Park around 900 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Kirvin. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 187 and 209. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
